channel.title: Conference on Krzysztof's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on Krzysztof's Blog

item.title: Speaker: EuroPython 2025
item.description: Presentation # Topic: Async Python: Concurrency Without the Headaches Language: English Date: July 17, 2025 Co-presenter: Mateusz Zaremba, Application Architect at Ørsted I presented on asynchronous programming in Python at EuroPython 2025 in Prague alongside my colleague Mateusz Zaremba.

item.title: Speaker: Warsaw IT Days 2025
item.description: Presentation # Topic: Async Python: Concurrency Without the Headaches Language: English I’ll be presenting on asynchronous programming in Python at the 16th edition of Warsaw IT Days (Warszawskie Dni Informatyki).
